thread.title_full: Video: Minivan Challenge & 2015 BMW X5 M | Watch MotorWeek Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: Minivan Challenge & 2015 BMW X5 M MotorWeek
text: In this episode, we show off our version of a family feud as we shop today’s top minivans. Pat Goss has quick fixes for two annoying troubles, down at Goss’ Garage. Yolanda Vazquez shows all the eye candy at the 2015 Frankfurt Motor Show. Next, we feed our need for Germanic speed, with the BMW X5 M!
